products.title: Linara Spc, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: In a sumptuous, eye-soothing blend of shimmering white and cool cream, the linara in natural adds timeless elegance to any home. Its dimout function restricts bright light, bathing the room in a softened glow. This truly beautiful cream colour provides the perfect accompaniment for mid-neutral colour palettes in a living room, or even serves to tone down more vibrant greens, purples, and terracotta shades.

products.title: Linara Spc, Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: An effective dim-out blind, the linara smoke restricts light whilst avoiding the total darkness afforded by a blackout. Grey is a colour that never goes out of fashion, perhaps due to its dual functionality as both a useful neutral and a stand-alone feature colour, so this blind will last for years, through a multitude of trends. The striking contemporary greys used in the smoke will be most at home in a modern living room.

products.title: Linara Spc, Ice - Roller Blind
products.description: Celebrate the crisp and refreshing shade of linara spc ice by allowing yourself to rest and relax every time you see it. For those of you who love to integrate contemporary colours with more traditional decor, it holds the keys to unlocking an incredible new look. If you want to match with spc ice you need to think beyond the normal colour combinations. Colours that breathe new life into spaces like powder blues and washed out mint greens are exciting ideas that you may want to pursue a little further.
